@iamapker wrote:

item.title: Update Error? HELP
item.dc:creator: @Delift3d Delift3d
item.description:
@Delift3d wrote:

Ok so im playing on my 508 server and there is some things I dont like. Lets say I want to change the dialauge of an npc. Like the Wise Old Man. So I go in this: (C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\Desktop\MySource\Bulby\io\packets\NPCOption1) Then I Find What I want to edit. Heres the code if it helps at all. [code=java]NPC pnp = Engine.npcs[p.clickId];
NPC np = Engine.npcs[p.FamiliarID];

if(pnp.npcType == 2253)//Wise Old Man
{
if(p.QuestPoints < 2)
{
p.Dialogue = 0;
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9827, 241, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, 2567, 241, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “Wise Old Man”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “Unavalable (come back later)…”, 241, 4);
}
else
{
p.Dialogue = 111;
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9850, 241, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, 2567, 241, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “Wise Old Man”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “Unavalable (come back later)…”, 241, 4);
}[/code]
I changed the dialauge but he still says what he said before. I dont get it. And yes when I edited it I had the server offline and when I was done I saved and compiled with zero errors. When I started it back up nothing changed. He still said what he said before. Please help!!!

Read full topic
